Literature.Title: Protegrin structure-activity relationships: using homology models of synthetic sequences to determine structural characteristics important for activity.
Literature.Author: Ostberg N, Kaznessis Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=2.2µg/ml),Neisseria gonorrhoeae F-62(MIC=1µg/ml),Neisseria gonorrhoeae FA-19(MIC=6.3µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes(MIC=23.3µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=61.9µg/ml)
